QuestData.Title: Hunting Trophies
QuestData.Description:
To be a hopebreaker is to conquer all prey, not just souls.
The Banewood is home to many dangerous creatures: deathwalkers, fearspinners, and the horrifying doomfangs. If you wish to really master the art of the hunt, you should be able to defeat these foes.
Bring me trophies as proof of your conquests. Then, you may just earn my respect.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Doomfang Skulls, $2oa Pristine Deathwalker Paws, and $3oa Prized Fearspinner Fangs.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Constantin examines what you have brought him>
Well done. You may make a fine hopebreaker yet.
